ticket.title: [PATCH] Replace rudimentary named_scope with scope
ticket.original-body: * rename method names (actually in tests) * rename instance variable @_named_scopes_cache to @_scopes_cache * rename references in doc comments * don't touch CHANGELOG :)

* rename method names (actually in tests) * rename instance variable @_named_scopes_cache to @_scopes_cache * rename references in doc comments * don't touch CHANGELOG :) https://github.com/rails/rails/commit/96bae30538951367a82235785e7dba3577b50a5a
